TEST_NAME: Page items should avoid hardcoded indexes
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (
    select case
         when (    lower(trim(html_form_element_attributes)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_12)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_04)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_03)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_13)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_07)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(item_button_image_attributes)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_02)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_09)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_15)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_05)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_14)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(html_table_cell_attr_label)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_10)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(quick_pick_link_attr)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(html_table_cell_attr_element)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(read_only_display_attr)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(grid_column_attributes)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_11)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_08)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(form_element_option_attributes)) like '%tabindex%'
                or lower(trim(attribute_06)) like '%tabindex%' ) then 'N' 
         else 'Y'
       end pass_yn,
       page_id,
       application_id,
       quick_pick_link_attr,
       attribute_01,
       attribute_02,
       attribute_03,
       attribute_04,
       attribute_05,
       attribute_06,
       attribute_07,
       attribute_08,
       attribute_09,
       attribute_10,
       attribute_11,
       attribute_12,
       attribute_13,
       attribute_14,
       attribute_15,
       read_only_display_attr,
       html_table_cell_attr_label,
       html_table_cell_attr_element,
       html_form_element_attributes,
       form_element_option_attributes,
       item_button_image_attributes,
       grid_column_attributes,
       last_updated_by,
       last_updated_on,
       build_option,
       item_name,
       item_id,
	     workspace
    from apex_application_page_items
    )
select aapi.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has hardcoded index', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has hardcoded index', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.4.3 Focus OrderChecking application where tabindex has been added to an attribute that have negative impact on tab/focus order
